entry.title: Go runtime memory less than system said

link.title: Go runtime memory less than system said

entry.content: I just encounted a weird problem in go runtime,which go runtimes only reclaim 6G memory, but monitor told me the machine’s memory is at 50GB,so does the df -h said.
entry.summary: I just encounted a weird problem in go runtime,which go runtimes only reclaim 6G memory, but monitor told me the machine’s memory is at 50GB,so does the df -h said.
